metadata.name: The Ancient
metadata.description:
Here is my first mod, that i use to learn.
i maked a custom skin inspired from the old keeper, mod image and video will apprear soon
the character start with random stat choose in a "poolpack" and every 5 rooms without taking any damage he will spawn an item from the pack pool (there is only 4 item in the pool)
he start with 2 red hearth, the cracked dice and the cracked crown trinked
there are some bugs, if you see one please tell me anyway i'am still working on it
